I don't know if anyone noticed, but this is a commemorative US Marine corps jacket. That's one of the reasons I purchased it, and also why I purchased it in the grey and olive drab color palette. I'm overjoyed with this purchase. My eldest daughter is a US Marine, and my training as a security contractor was with Force Recon - 4th company. This jacket is beautiful, and very well made.

This is a classic style varsity jacket that looks really cool, and retro. And it's also super comfortable and soft. It's very well made, the stitching and zipper is all good quality. It fit's true to size, very slightly on the larger size, which is what you'd want for a jacket like this. The style color and design is really great. I love it!

I am a big fan of this jacket, it is a big benefit to ease out winter's frigid weather and make the clothing I have been wearing on repeat feel fresh and wearable for warmer days ahead. It is very lightweight, and I absolutely love the color pattern. I highly recommend it.

Got it just to see how it felt and was planning to give it as a gift if I didn't like it. What a nice surprise was for me to see how good this jacket looks and feels. Got a lot of compliments about it too (which I normally don't receive on what I wear... lol.)  I got the dark grey one, might bite the bullet and get the dark blue one too.

The Dipucool Men's Corduroy Vintage Varsity Jacket is a fashion gem that seamlessly blends elegance and retro charm. The moment I put it on, I was captivated by its remarkable design that harks back to the classic letterman baseball jackets of the past. The vintage graphic print and lettering add an authentic touch, making it an iconic addition to my wardrobe. What truly impressed me about this jacket is its perfect fit. It drapes beautifully, offering a tailored look that's neither too loose nor too snug. The corduroy material is not only comfortable but also lightweight, making it suitable for various occasions and seasons. Additionally, the easy wash and care requirements are a practical bonus, ensuring that I can enjoy the timeless style of this jacket without the hassle of high-maintenance cleaning.
Very true to size. Great weight. Looks good.

This sport jacket is one of the kind that you must feel it physically to appreciate how well it's made. The thickness of it yet it's lightweight, cozy and of course, it's very comfortable. Snow days would be appropriate for this jacket to give you the full warmness it has to offer. Recommended.
